input: Whatâ€™s the GST exemption for rare disease medicines in 2025?
output: For FY 2025-26, IGST is exempt on Dinutuximab (Quarziba) and medicines/Food for Special Medical Purposes (FSMP) for rare diseases when imported for personal use or by Centres of Excellence for Rare Diseases (or recommended institutions). File exemption claims via gst.gov.in.
